Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: A3 and A4 photocopier, videos, DVDs, newspapers, spoken word cassettes and books in Urdu. The library has noticeboards and a meeting room available for hire (please contact for details). Activities include class visits, Councillor's surgery and Baby Time. Provides 4 People's Network computers (1 large screen for visually impaired people) with Microsoft Office and Internet access, available for public use.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 10am-12.30pm, 1.30-6pm, Tues & Thurs closed, Wed & Fri 9.30am-12.30pm, 1.30-6pm, Sat 9.30am-12.30pm (opening times)
